invalid_email_format: Entered email address not in a valid format
invalid_role_id: Invalid role id | Role id is either 1 or 2
create_not_authorized: Not authorized to create a company
view_not_authorized: Not authorized to view company list
not_allowed_to_view: Not authorized to view a company
get_company_by_id_not_found: Company with id is not available
delete_not_authorized: Not authorized to delete a company
update_not_authorized: Not authorized to update a company
not_authorized: Not authorized to add user in a company
user_already_in_company: User already exist in the company
user_in_another_company: User already exist in another company
user_add_failed: Failed to add user in the company
user_added_to_company: User successfully added to the company
users_found: User found successfully in this company
no_users_found: No user is found in this company
otp_verified: The OTP has been verified successfully
password_mismatch: New password and confirm password do not match
